issue.title: www.androidacy.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.androidacy.com/magisk-modules-repository/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.androidacy.com%2Fmagisk-modules-repository%2F) ### Comment > Effected filterlist: AdGuard Annoyances > Screenshot: One with AdGuard Annoyances, nothing happens. The otherwise, without AdGuard Annoyances, the intended screen to be seen. > > An **AdGuard Annoyances** filter prevents the scripted overlay from being seen/functioning on the following domain: https://www.androidacy.com/magisk-modules-repository/ > > Nothing happens when clicking either the download icon nor the book icon, while under normal circumstances clicking them would direct you to an overlay with additional information. The following filter prevents this functionality from working: > androidacy.com#$#.modal-open > div[role="dialog"][style*="display: block;"] { display: none !important; } > > Solution: For the moment, I have allowed, the filter locally through changing #$# to #@$#: > androidacy.com#@$#.modal-open > div[role="dialog"][style*="display: block;"] { display: none !important; } ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/ejQkOA7.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/isKyP0R.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin 1.48.4 Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

issue.title: voz.vn
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://voz.vn/t/co-gai-dai-loan-bi-lo-co-sugar-daddy-vi-khay-trung-loai-ngon.759082/page-2](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvoz.vn%2Ft%2Fco-gai-dai-loan-bi-lo-co-sugar-daddy-vi-khay-trung-loai-ngon.759082%2Fpage-2) ### Comment > I add an user rule: which is voz.vn##.message-avatar > And this rule is only working when I open Filtering Log. > Otherwise it doesn't working ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/65kjcIO.png)
